title: About
text:
Hello! I am Francesco D‚ÄôAmico, a PhD student in Physics at Sapienza University of Rome, where I work under the supervision of Matteo Negri and Chiara Cammarota on the topic of statistical theory of learning.
My research lies at the intersection of statistical mechanics, machine learning, and complex systems.

Research Interests

Data structure role in machine learning and neural scaling laws.
